# Introduction

This vignette explains how to use the `iModMixData` package to load example data for the `iModMix` package.

# Loading the Package

First, load the `iModMixData` package:

```{r}
library(iModMixData)
```

# Accessing the Data
The package provides functions to access datasets stored in ExperimentHub.

## Load PartialCorGenes
```{r, eval=FALSE}
genes <- loadPartialCorGenes()
head(genes)
```

## Load PartialCorMetabolites

```{r, eval=FALSE}
metabolites <- loadPartialCorMetabolites()
head(metabolites)
```

## Load PartialCorProt

```{r, eval=FALSE}
proteins <- loadPartialCorProt()
head(proteins)
```

# Session Information

```{r sessionInfo, echo=FALSE}
sessionInfo()
```
